name: ScamGame
description:
Your friend got hacked, and the hacker sent a scam message to you. He wants to go on a hacking spree! Let's interact with the friend in a few ways.

ScamGame is a choice command line game, meaning you can run it on your $5 Windows 95 PC. 

(based on a true story, someone in my DMs got hacked and i made this game)

(also the image is from the internet dont mind my bad drawing skillz)
